name: Blaze Ball
description:
A 3D Pong Game that I contributed to for Uni. Big thanks to sam007mac for carrying us on this project.  The multiplayer option is only for LAN and uses the crappy deprecated unity network component. USE MULTIPLAYER ONLY IF YOU KNOW HOW IT WORKS.

Third-Party Assets:
  • Harmful or Fatal by Kevin Macleod
  • The Machine Thinks by Kevin Macleod
  • Bossa Nova Elevator music by BCrutchfield
